The hermetick romance, or, The chymical wedding written in High Dutch by Christian Rosencreutz ; translated by E. Foxcroft ... Chymische Hochzeit. English. 1690 Rosencreutz, Christian. Foxcroft, E.
226, [1] p.
Printed by A. Sowle ..., [London] : 1690.
Translation of: Chymische Hochzeit. Christian Rosencreutz is the pseudonym of Johann Valentin Andreä. "Licensed & entred according to order" Place of publication from NUC pre-1956. Errata on p. [1] at end. Reproduction of original in Glasgow University Library.
=======

Translation of: Chymische Hochzeit. Christian Rosencreutz is the pseudonym of Johann Valentin Andreä. "Licensed & entred according to order" Place of publication from NUC pre-1956. Errata on p. [1] at end. Reproduction of original in Glasgow University Library.
